attribute.value: Hello! I'm here to assist you with any customer service inquiries you may have. Whether you need information about our products, services, or policies, or if you need help resolving an issue or completing a transaction, feel free to ask. How can I assist you today?
attribute.task: start message

Execute Provide detailed information about robot specifications and features
Greet the user and let them know you can assist with inquiries regarding rental plans and pricing for robots. Ask them to specify their query.
If the user has a specific question, use the RAGWorker to search the company's documentation for details about rental plans and pricing, then share the information with the user.
Inquire if the user needs further clarification or has additional questions regarding the robot rental plans and pricing.
Offer to help with any other customer service inquiries related to rental processes or policies.
Execute Provide information about shipping and delivery timelines for different robot models
Greet the user and ask them what specific information they are seeking about ClouTea shop (i.e., menu, operations, or location).
If the user asks about the menu, use RAGWorker to provide detailed information about the ClouTea shop menu offerings.
If the user asks about operations (e.g., opening hours, services), use RAGWorker to provide information based on the company's operational details.
If the user asks about the location, use RAGWorker to provide directions or address information of ClouTea shop.
Ask if the user needs further assistance or any additional information.
Greet the user and ask them to describe the issue they are facing with their robot.
Use RAGWorker to access the company's documentation to find relevant troubleshooting steps based on the user's issue.
Provide the user with the troubleshooting steps and guide them through the process.
Ask the user if the issue has been resolved or if they need further assistance.
If the issue persists, offer to connect the user with a human support agent or escalate the issue as per the company's escalation policy.
Greet the user and inquire about their interest in scheduling a product demonstration or consultation.
Ask the user for their preferred date and time for the demonstration or consultation.
Confirm the availability based on the provided schedule using RAGWorker to retrieve information about available time slots or the process for scheduling.
Provide the available options to the user and confirm their selection.
Finalize the scheduling, provide confirmation details, and ask if the user needs any further assistance.
Execute Provide details about Richtech Robotics office locations and contact information

edges.intent: User inquires about provide detailed information about robot specifications and features
User inquires about provide assistance regarding rental plans and pricing for robots
User inquires about provide information about shipping and delivery timelines for different robot models
User inquires about provide information about cloutea shop menu, operations and location
User inquires about provide guidance for technical support and troubleshooting for robots
User inquires about facilitate scheduling of product demonstrations or consultations
User inquires about provide details about richtech robotics office locations and contact information

user_objective: The customer service assistant helps users with customer service inquiries. It can provide information about products, services, and policies, as well as help users resolve issues and complete transactions.
builder_objective: The customer service assistant helps to request customer's contact information.
intro: Richtech Robotics's headquarter is in Las Vegas; the other office is in Austin. Richtech Robotics provide worker robots (ADAM, ARM, ACE), delivery robots (Matradee, Matradee X, Matradee L, Richie), cleaning robots (DUST-E SX, DUST-E MX) and multipurpose robots (skylark). Their products are intended for business purposes, but not for home purpose; the ADAM robot is available for purchase and rental for multiple purposes. This robot bartender makes tea, coffee and cocktails. Richtech Robotics also operate the world's first robot milk tea shop, ClouTea, in Las Vegas (www.cloutea.com), where all milk tea beverages are prepared by the ADAM robot. The delivery time will be one month for the delivery robot, 2 weeks for standard ADAM, and two months for commercial cleaning robot.

tasks.name: Provide detailed information about robot specifications and features
tasks.description: User wants to inquire about product specifications

steps.task: Execute Provide detailed information about robot specifications and features
steps.example_response: Here are the detailed specifications and features of the robot you inquired about.

tasks.name: Provide assistance regarding rental plans and pricing for robots
tasks.description: User seeks information about product rental

steps.task: Greet the user and let them know you can assist with inquiries regarding rental plans and pricing for robots. Ask them to specify their query.
steps.example_response: Hello! I can assist you with inquiries regarding rental plans and pricing for robots. Could you please specify your query?

steps.task: If the user has a specific question, use the RAGWorker to search the company's documentation for details about rental plans and pricing, then share the information with the user.
steps.example_response: Let me check the details for you. Please hold on for a moment.

steps.task: Inquire if the user needs further clarification or has additional questions regarding the robot rental plans and pricing.
steps.example_response: Do you need any further clarification or have any additional questions about the robot rental plans and pricing?

steps.task: Offer to help with any other customer service inquiries related to rental processes or policies.
steps.example_response: Is there anything else I can assist you with regarding rental processes or policies?

tasks.name: Provide information about shipping and delivery timelines for different robot models
tasks.description: User has questions about shipping and delivery times

steps.task: Execute Provide information about shipping and delivery timelines for different robot models
steps.example_response: Based on our records, here are the shipping and delivery timelines for the robot models you are interested in.

tasks.name: Provide information about ClouTea shop menu, operations and location
tasks.description: User wants to know about ClouTea shop operations

steps.task: Greet the user and ask them what specific information they are seeking about ClouTea shop (i.e., menu, operations, or location).
steps.example_response: Hello! Welcome to ClouTea. What specific information are you looking for today? Our menu, operations, or location?

steps.task: If the user asks about the menu, use RAGWorker to provide detailed information about the ClouTea shop menu offerings.
steps.example_response: Here's the menu information for ClouTea. We offer a variety of teas, smoothies, and snacks.

steps.task: If the user asks about operations (e.g., opening hours, services), use RAGWorker to provide information based on the company's operational details.
steps.example_response: ClouTea is open from 9 AM to 9 PM daily. We offer dine-in, takeout, and delivery services.

steps.task: If the user asks about the location, use RAGWorker to provide directions or address information of ClouTea shop.
steps.example_response: ClouTea is located at 123 Tea Street, Suite A. Would you like directions?

steps.task: Ask if the user needs further assistance or any additional information.
steps.example_response: Is there anything else you need help with or any additional information you require?

tasks.name: Provide guidance for technical support and troubleshooting for robots
tasks.description: User needs assistance with technical support

steps.task: Greet the user and ask them to describe the issue they are facing with their robot.
steps.example_response: Hello! Can you please describe the issue you are facing with your robot?

steps.task: Use RAGWorker to access the company's documentation to find relevant troubleshooting steps based on the user's issue.
Provide the user with the troubleshooting steps and guide them through the process.
steps.example_response: Here are some troubleshooting steps that might help resolve your issue. Let's go through them one by one.

steps.task: Ask the user if the issue has been resolved or if they need further assistance.
steps.example_response: Has the issue been resolved, or do you need further assistance?

steps.task: If the issue persists, offer to connect the user with a human support agent or escalate the issue as per the company's escalation policy.
steps.example_response: I can connect you with a human support agent for further assistance, or escalate the issue if necessary. Would you like me to do that?

tasks.name: Facilitate scheduling of product demonstrations or consultations
tasks.description: User interested in scheduling a demonstration

steps.task: Greet the user and inquire about their interest in scheduling a product demonstration or consultation.
steps.example_response: Hello! Are you interested in scheduling a product demonstration or consultation?

steps.task: Ask the user for their preferred date and time for the demonstration or consultation.
steps.example_response: Could you please let me know your preferred date and time for the demonstration or consultation?

steps.task: Confirm the availability based on the provided schedule using RAGWorker to retrieve information about available time slots or the process for scheduling.
steps.example_response: Let me check the available time slots for you.

steps.task: Provide the available options to the user and confirm their selection.
steps.example_response: Here are the available options for your requested date and time. Please confirm your selection.

steps.task: Finalize the scheduling, provide confirmation details, and ask if the user needs any further assistance.
steps.example_response: Your demonstration has been scheduled. Here are the details. Do you need any further assistance?

tasks.name: Provide details about Richtech Robotics office locations and contact information
tasks.description: User seeks information on company locations

steps.task: Execute Provide details about Richtech Robotics office locations and contact information
steps.example_response: Here are the details about Richtech Robotics office locations and contact information: [Office Locations and Contacts]
